message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.AI 

This paper involves computer vision techniques such as markerless motion capture and dense pose estimation, which are commonly studied in the computer vision community. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves graphics (cs.GR) as it deals with capturing human motion for animation and gaming. Additionally, the paper involves machine learning techniques such as training a dense pose detector, which falls under cs.MM (Machine Learning). The paper also involves robotics (cs.RO) as it can be applied to human-robot interaction and motion planning. Finally, the paper involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it deals with developing intelligent systems for motion capture and analysis.
